{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|extent}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr index_type extent( rank_type i ) const noexcept;
}}

Returns dynamic extent size of an {{rlpt|/|extents}} at a certain rank index.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|The rank index to get the extent size of}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The dynamic extent size of an {{tt|extents}} at a certain rank index.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;mdspan&gt;

int main()
{
    std::extents&lt;int, 1, 2&gt; e1;
    std::extents&lt;int, 3, std::dynamic_extent, std::dynamic_extent&gt; e2(4, 5);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; e1.extent(0) &lt;&lt; ", " &lt;&lt; e1.extent(1) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; e2.extent(0) &lt;&lt; ", " &lt;&lt; e2.extent(1) &lt;&lt; ", " &lt;&lt; e2.extent(2) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
1, 2
3, 4, 5
}}
